subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the first game between the teams this season, the Nets’ Vince Carter (27 points) got the better of the Heat’s Dwyane Wade (17 points) in the scoring column. But Wade made the bigger plays down the stretch.
snippet: In the first game between the teams this season, the Nets’ Vince Carter (27 points) got the better of the Heat’s Dwyane Wade (17 points) in the scoring column. But Wade made the bigger plays down the stretch.
